experience.title: Investment Commentator
experience.description: I am convinced that the coming decade presents a unique chance to create generational wealth through informed and strategic investing. My newsletter serves as a guide to this evolving landscape, offering insights and strategies to seize emerging opportunities. It documents my investment framework and ideas, while tracking three portfolios as a means to keep scoreâ€¦Embark on this journey with us as we delve into the unfolding of these investment principles

experience.title: Head of Distribution (MEANA region) & UHNW's
experience.description: Working with UHNWI's, financial advisors, family offices and wealth managers throughout the Middle East, Africa and Asia.  As independent investment consultants we provide access a range of fixed income investments, investment funds, investment platforms and wealth structures for investors. Along with access to investment opportunities we assist with portfolio design and management.
